# Load packages

```{r, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(tidymodels)
library(readr)
```

---

# Data Preparation

```{r}
titanic <- 
  read_csv("https://tinyurl.com/mlr-titanic") %>% 
  mutate(
    survived = factor(survived),
    pclass = factor(pclass),
    sex = factor(sex)
  ) %>% 
  na.omit()

# view
head(titanic)
```

---

# Split Data 

```{r}
titanic_split <- initial_split(titanic, prop = 0.8, strata = 'survived')
titanic_train <- training(titanic_split)
titanic_test <- testing(titanic_split)

dim(titanic_train)
dim(titanic_test)
```

---

# Specify Model

```{r}
log_reg <- logistic_reg() %>% 
  set_engine("glm") %>% 
  set_mode("classification")

log_reg
```

---

# Fit Model

```{r}
survived_fit <- log_reg %>% 
  fit(survived ~ ., data = titanic_train)

survived_fit
```

---

# Inspect Results

```{r}
# coefficients 
tidy(survived_fit)
```

---

# Training Set Performance

```{r}
glance(survived_fit)
```

---

# Make Predictions on Test Set

```{r}
survived_test_preds <- predict(survived_fit, new_data = titanic_test)
survived_test_preds
```
```{r}
# merge predictions with test data 

survived_preds <- titanic_test %>% 
  select(survived) %>%
  bind_cols(survived_test_preds)
survived_preds
```

---

# Examine Predicted vs Trusted Data

```{r, warning=FALSE}
conf_mat(data = survived_preds, truth = survived, estimate = .pred_class)
```
